SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.mx

Class StrictTransportSecurity

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.mx.StrictTransportSecurity
public class StrictTransportSecurity extends Object
Strict Transport Security.

Implementation of MTA-STS RFC8461.

  • Method Details

    • getPolicy

      public Optional<StsPolicy> getPolicy(String domain) throws org.apache.commons.validator.ValidatorException, NoRecordException, BadRecordException, BadPolicyException, PolicyFetchErrorException, PolicyWebPKIInvalidException
      Gets policy with given domain string.

      Fetches DNS record every time.

      Checks record is valid.

      Tryes to get policy from cache.

      If policy is not in cache will fetch and put it in cache.

      Parameters:
      domain - Domain string.
      Returns:
      Optional of StsPolicy instance.
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.validator.ValidatorException - Domain provided is invalid.
      BadPolicyException - HTTPS policy is invalid or not found.
      BadRecordException - DNS record is invalid or not found.
      NoRecordException
      PolicyFetchErrorException
      PolicyWebPKIInvalidException

    • getPolicy

      public Optional<StsPolicy> getPolicy(String domain, Config config) throws org.apache.commons.validator.ValidatorException, NoRecordException, BadRecordException, BadPolicyException, PolicyFetchErrorException, PolicyWebPKIInvalidException
      Gets policy with given domain string and config instance.

      Fetches DNS record every time.

      Checks record is valid.

      Tryes to get policy from cache.

      If policy is not in cache will fetch and put it in cache.

      Config instance can be used to modify validation checks.

      Parameters:
      domain - Domain string.
      config - Config instance.
      Returns:
      Optional of StsPolicy instance.
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.validator.ValidatorException - Domain provided is invalid.
      NoRecordException - DNS Exception.
      BadRecordException - DNS record is invalid or not found.
      BadPolicyException - HTTPS policy is invalid or not found.
      PolicyWebPKIInvalidException - Policy web PKI invalid exception.
      PolicyFetchErrorException - Policy fetch error exception.

    • getPolicy

      private StsPolicy getPolicy(StsRecord stsRecord, Config config) throws PolicyWebPKIInvalidException, PolicyFetchErrorException
      Gets policy from cache if any.
      Parameters:
      stsRecord - StsRecord instance.
      config - Config instance.
      Returns:
      StsPolicy instance.
      Throws:
      PolicyWebPKIInvalidException - Policy web PKI invalid exception.
      PolicyFetchErrorException - Policy fetch error exception.
